statements: UPDATE player_progress SET level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;

UPDATE player_progress SET level = 10, experience = experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_progress SET experience = experience + 50 WHERE level >= 5
UPDATE player_progress SET player_name = 'John Doe', experience = experience + 200 WHERE player_id = 3

UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.1 WHERE player_id = 2;

UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1, player_exp = player_exp + 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_exp = 0 WHERE player_level >= 10;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.1 WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
UPDATE players SET player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 10;
UPDATE items SET item_price = 20.99 WHERE item_id = 3;

UPDATE items SET item_price = item_price * 1.1 WHERE item_id IN (1, 2);

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE player_id = 1 AND transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = 5, equipped = TRUE WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_id = 3;

UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase'
UPDATE players SET email = CONCAT('new_', email) WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
